rows.label: qst002402_msg0001
rows.name: Ekurt? Yes, that's me...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0002
rows.name: What do you want?

rows.label: qst002402_msg0004
rows.name:
Are...are you quite sure?
Azgall's...dead...?
I can't...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0005
rows.name:
This is Azgall's...
Then it's true...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0006
rows.name:
He fought right up until the end...
but it wasn't enough...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0007
rows.name:
He used to salvage with me, back in
the day.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0008
rows.name:
Well, one day, I messed up big time and
lost my radar, leaving me adrift in the
Cloud Sea. This was many years ago...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0009
rows.name:
It was looking bleak for me. I'd run out
of air, nearly done for. But then Azgall
came and found me.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0010
rows.name:
Turns out he'd pushed himself to
his limits on the way, though.
He collapsed himself not long after.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0011
rows.name:
So the both of us ended up
drifting to Luxuria.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0012
rows.name:
But, as you know...Luxuria is a closed
country.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0013
rows.name:
Getting back to Superbia wasn't an
option.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0014
rows.name:
Luckily, we managed to get the help of
a few kind souls. So we made a home
here.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0015
rows.name: I put down roots. Lived a normal life.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0016
rows.name: But not Azgall.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0017
rows.name:
He didn't really take to life
here. Said he wanted to go
back to Superbia.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0018
rows.name:
That's what he told me the last time I
saw him, anyway...

rows.label: qst002402_msg0019
rows.name:
It's not easy to get out of Luxuria
on your own. I was doing what
I could to help.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0020
rows.name:
But... I didn't think he'd wind up dying
right here in Luxuria.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0022
rows.name:
You should take the things from his
buried chest.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0023
rows.name:
I'm not a salvager anymore, so they're
no use to me. He'd be happy to have
them be useful to someone, I expect.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0024
rows.name:
Anyway, thank you. I'm grateful to you
for finding Azgall.

rows.label: qst002402_msg0025
rows.name: Yes, it's put our minds at rest.
